TEXT.TITLE: MEDICORE INC <MDK> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 15 cts vs 32 cts Oper net 656,927 vs 1,388,765 Revs 15.4 mln vs 11.3 mln NOTE: 1985 net includes pretax gain 1,880,056 dlrs on sale of stock in subsidiary. Net excludes discontinued operations loss 641,001 dlrs vs profit 281,818 dlrs. Reuter
